mapper.sql: id, project_id, belong_uid, file_valid, project_progress, file_worktype, career_line, file_source, file_type, remark, voucher_id, file_status, file_uid, fil_uri, updated_time, created_time, file_length, file_key, bucket_name,file_name,file_suffix,record_type,meeting_id,interview_record_id,meeting_record_id

otherwise.if: and file_worktype is not null and file_worktype != 'fileWorktype:12'

mapper.select: select count(0) from sop_file sf left join sop_voucher_file svf on sf.voucher_id = svf.id left join platform_user pu on sf.file_uid = pu.id, sop_project sp where sf.project_id = sp.id and (select dict.dict_value from dict where dict.dict_code = sp.project_progress) >= (select dict.dict_value from dict where dict.dict_code = sf.project_progress) and sf.file_worktype is not null and sf.file_worktype != 'fileWorktype:12'
mapper.sql: sf.id,sf.belong_uid,sf.project_id,sp.project_name,sp.create_uid as edit_user,sf.project_progress, sf.file_worktype,sf.career_line,sf.file_source,sf.file_type, sf.voucher_id,sf.file_status,sf.file_uid,pu.real_name as file_uname,sf.updated_time, sf.created_time,sf.file_length,sf.file_key,sf.bucket_name,sf.file_name, sf.file_suffix,sf.file_valid,sf.record_type, svf.file_status as v_status

sql.if: and (sp.project_name like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") or pu.real_name like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") )

mapper.insert: insert into sop_file (id, project_id, belong_uid, file_valid, project_progress, file_worktype, career_line, file_source, file_type, remark, voucher_id, file_status, file_uid, fil_uri, updated_time, created_time, file_length, file_key, bucket_name,file_name,file_suffix,record_type,meeting_id,interview_record_id,meeting_record_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{belongUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileWorktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{careerLine,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{voucherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{filUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileLength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bucketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{meetingId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{interviewRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{meetingRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update sop_file set career_line = #{careerLine} where project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.select:
select
,file_id from sop_file_history
order by created_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sop_file_history ( id, project_id, belong_uid, file_valid, project_progress,file_worktype, career_line, file_source,file_type, remark, voucher_id, file_status,file_uid, fil_uri, updated_time, created_time, file_length, file_key, bucket_name,file_name,file_suffix, record_type,meeting_id,interview_record_id, meeting_record_id,file_id) SELECT #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_id, belong_uid, file_valid, project_progress,file_worktype, career_line, file_source,file_type, remark, voucher_id, file_status,file_uid, fil_uri, updated_time, created_time, file_length, file_key, bucket_name,file_name,file_suffix, record_type,meeting_id,interview_record_id, meeting_record_id,id FROM sop_file WHERE id = #{fileId}
